page.title: 03NEWSPAPER STORIES (12.7.85)
page.content: We made a comparison between the stories on the front page of two local papers, looking at those from 5.7.85 (see page 2) and 12.7.85. The closure of Waltham Abbey's{Honey {Lane Hospital}is still the main story in one of the papers. This hospital caters for psychogeriatric and geriatric patients in the district. The{West Essex Health Authority}want to shut it (making an annual saving of {Â£500,000}a year). At a recent Waltham Abbey Church {fete,}Â£1,500 was raised. Other stories include the theft of car tyres from a local garage, and the poor quality of certain bus routes in the area. The result of the Waltham Abbey Town Council{lottery}is also announced on the front page. This week the first prize was{Â£245.
